response.raw:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
Dear Parents and Colleagues,

We are excited to announce a new initiative to enhance our students' learning experiences through focused, complex play. To achieve this, we are seeking parent volunteers and older students to assist in facilitating these activities.

Parent Volunteers:
• We invite parents to sign up for weekly or bi-weekly slots to help guide small group activities.
• Activities will include structured play scenarios, problem-solving tasks, and creative projects.
• Training and materials will be provided to ensure a consistent approach.

Older Student Mentors:
• Students from higher grades will be paired with younger children as "play buddies."
• They will model advanced play techniques and encourage imaginative thinking.
• This program will foster leadership skills in older students while benefiting younger learners.

Benefits:
• Enhanced social skills and cognitive development for all participants
• Increased community involvement in our school
• Opportunities for intergenerational learning and mentorship

If you are interested in participating or have any questions, please contact the school office. Together, we can create a rich, engaging play environment that supports our children's growth and development.

Thank you for your support and involvement in our school community.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
Senior Elementary School Teacher
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
